name: node-cubrid
description: This is a Node.js driver for CUBRID RDBMS. It is developed in 100% JavaScript and does not require specific platform compilation.
author: CUBRID <contact@cubrid.org> (http://www.cubrid.org/)

scripts.instrument: npm run clean && jscoverage src src-cov
scripts.cover: npm run instrument && CODE_COV=1 NODE_ENV=test ./node_modules/.bin/nodeunit --reporter=lcov test | node test/testSetup/fix_lcov.js | ./node_modules/.bin/coveralls
